plot outline: Sukumar is a bratty young man with his vanities. Having grown up in USA, away from his extended family, he becomes a very self-centered young man. How he transforms into a well mannered young man appreciating the true value of family relations is what the movie is all about.
title: Sukumarudu
plot: Suku sees relationships as a means to an end. So when he sets out to establish his company, he looks to his grandmother's property as a solution to his money woes.

Sukumar is a bratty young man with his vanities. Having grown up in USA, away from his extended family, he becomes a very self-centered young man. How he transforms into a well mannered young man appreciating the true value of family relations is what the movie is all about.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
